sourcesContent:
<input 
    type="text"
    class="py-2 px-3 rounded-md text-sm text-zinc-800 placeholder:text-zinc-600 bg-zinc-50 min-w-[400px] border-[1px] border-zinc-300 outline-none"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    [type]="type"
    [value]="inputValue()"
    (change)="handleChange($event)"
>
